pageContext.claim: “Thousands of our citizens are killed by lethal narcotics -- 88,000 people, just with certain types of drugs -- most of which come through the southern border.”
pageContext.analysis: President Trump seems to be mixing up an out of date statistic listed on the CDC website for the number of people on average who died as a result of excessive alcohol use with the number of people killed by narcotics in 2017—  approximately 70,000.
